noun.description: The central point, pin, or shaft on which a mechanism turns or oscillates.

verb.description: Turn on or as if on a pivot.
examples: he swung around, pivoting on his heel
the sail pivots around the axis of a virtually static mast

origin: Late Middle English: from French, probably from the root of dialect pue tooth of a comb and Spanish pu(y)a point. The verb dates from the mid 19th century.
